text: Taurus Tremani Bartlett (born January 6, 1999), known by his professional name Polo G, is an American rapper. He became famous with his singles "Finer Things" and "Pop Out" (featuring Lil Tjay). His first album Die a Legend (2019) went to number six on the Billboard 200. It was certified platinum by the RIAA. Bartlett's second studio album The Goat (2020) went to number two on the Billboard 200. It charted ten singles on the Billboard Hot 100. His third studio album Hall of Fame (2021) became Bartlett's first chart topping album. It included his first number-one single "Rapstar". == Albums == * Die a Legend (2019) * The Goat (2020) * Hall of Fame (2021) * Hall of Fame 2.0 (2021) == Awards and nominations == Award Year Nominee Category Result Ref.
